channel.title: Agile - Agile Bounded Domain on tangly Components
channel.description: Recent content in Agile - Agile Bounded Domain on tangly Components

item.title: Readme
item.description: Purpose The tangly erp agile bounded domain component provides regular business model abstractions for business applications written in Java. The component is using records and requires Java 21 LTS or higher. Try it out. Download and Documentation The library can be included in Maven as <dependency> <groupId>net.tangly.erp</groupId> <artifactId>collaborators</artifactId> <version>0.2.8</version> </dependency> Download and Documentation The library can be included in Gradle as implementation "net.tangly.erp:collaborators:0.2.8" The documentation can be found under Business documentation.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Agile Change Logs This document provides a high-level view of the changes introduced in the agile ERP library by release. For a detailed view of what has changed, refer to the repository commits. 0.2.8 (2024-09-30) 0.2.7 (2024-05-31) Update of library dependencies, update to JDK-20, and modern Gradle approach to build solutions.
